item.title: How to use the eraser tool
item.description: Highlights yourself to standout from the background üôå . Choose a photo you like Apply B&W filter to make the background Use the ‘image’ tool to add a same picture Tap the photo and use erase to remove the background Let the photo match for the background ‚ù§Ô∏è *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="How to use the eraser tool"
